mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity( activity_name, activity_starttime,activity_endtime, activity_adds,is_delete, CREATED_TIME,UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME )VALUES ( #{activityName}, #{activityStartTime},#{activityEndTime}, #{activityAdds},#{isDelete}, #{createdTime},#{updateBy}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT activityid AS activityId, activity_name AS activityName, activity_starttime AS activityStartTime, activity_endtime AS activityEndTime, activity_adds AS activityAdds, is_delete AS isDelete, CREATED_TIME AS createdTime, UPDATED_BY AS updateBy, UPDATED_TIME AS updateTime FROM activity WHERE activity_name=#{activityName}
SELECT activityid AS activityId, activity_name AS activityName, activity_starttime AS activityStartTime FROM activity
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET activity_name=#{activityName}, activity_starttime=#{activityStartTime}, activity_endtime=#{activityEndTime}, activity_adds=#{activityAdds}, UPDATED_BY=#{updateBy}, UPDATED_TIME=#{updateTime} WHERE activityid=#{activityId}
